title: Airplane Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed MLB app
but has not launched it yet
custom_steps:
When the user's device is in Airplane mode
and the user launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to go through onboarding
and will land on their default page

title: WiFi Connection
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed MLB app
but has not launched it yet
custom_steps:
When the user's device is connected to WiFi
and the user launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to go through onboarding
and will land on their default page

title: Cellular Connection
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed MLB app
but has not launched it yet
custom_steps:
When the user's device is on a cellular connection
and the user launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to go through onboarding
and will land on their default page

title: 16.0.0 Onboarding -> Sign Up Screen UI
custom_preconds: * Ensure user is not logged in
custom_steps:
Given the user clicks the Sign Up button
And the user is brought to the sign up page
custom_expected:
Then the User should NOT see the MLB Logo
And the user should see "Sign UP" as the page header
And The user should NOT see a green checkmark after each field is completed
And the word Birthdate should be "Birth Date"

title: Login Screen-> UI Updates
custom_preconds: * Ensure user is not logged in
custom_steps:
Given the user clicks the login button 
And the user is brought to the login page
custom_expected:
Then the user should NOT see the MLB logo
And the user should see "Log in" as the page header

title: Fresh Launch - Previous MLB Account Login
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps: When the user launches the app for the first time
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Welcome screen which will include the following:

MLB logo
Welcome text

and the following options:

their MLB account's email
"Continue with MLB" button
"Don't have an account? Sign up" button 
"Skip" button

title: "Continue with MLB"
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
and taps the "Continue with MLB" button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be logged in to the app with the saved account info (this will occur in the background)
and will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: "Log In with another MLB account"
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
and taps the "Log In with another MLB account" link
custom_expected: Then the login screen will appear

title: Logging in with another Account
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Login screen
and successfully logs in with an existing MLB account
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Sign Up Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
and taps the "Don't have an account? Sign up" button
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the Sign Up screen

title: Creating New Account
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Sign Up screen
and successfully creates a new MLB account
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Fresh Launch - No Previous MLB Account Login
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has never previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps: When the user launches the app for the first time
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Welcome screen which will include the following:

MLB logo
Welcome text

and the following options:

"Log in with MLB" button
"Don't have an account? Sign up" button 
"Skip" button

title: "Log in with MLB"
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has never previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
and taps "Log in with MLB"
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the login screen

title: Logging In
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has never previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user is on the login screen
and successfully logs in with a valid MLB account
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Sign Up Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has never previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
and taps "Don't have an account? Sign up" button
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the Sign Up screen

title: Creating New Account
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the MLB app
and has never previously logged in to MLB or MLB-properties apps with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Sign Up screen
and successfully creates a new MLB account
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Tapping "Skip" from Welcome Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the MLB app
and launches it for the first time
custom_steps: When the user taps "Skip" from the Welcome screen
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Tapping "Continue with MLB" from Welcome Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously installed the MLB or MLB-properties app
and had previously logged in with an MLB account
and fresh installs the MLB app
and launches it for the first time
custom_steps: When the user taps "Continue with MLB" from the Welcome screen
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Tapping "Log in with MLB" from Welcome Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has not previously logged in with an MLB account to the MLB or MLB-properties apps
and fresh installs the MLB app
and launches it for the first time
custom_steps: When the user taps "Log in with MLB" from the Welcome screen
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the "My Teams" picker

title: Favorite/Followed Team(s)
custom_preconds: Given the user is going through onboarding
custom_steps: When the user lands on the My Teams picker
custom_expected:
Then the user will be presented with the ability to choose to add Favorite and/or Followed Team(s)
along with a copy explaining this choice

title: Team Sort Order
custom_preconds: Given the user is going through onboarding
custom_steps: When the user lands on the My Teams picker
custom_expected:
Then the teams will be listed under "Teams" in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name
and they will each have a green plus sign to the left of their logo

title: No Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the My Teams picker
custom_steps: When the user doesn't have a Favorite team selected
custom_expected:
Then the following text will be under the "Favorite Team" section:

No Favorite Team selected

title: Adding Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the "My Teams" picker
and does not have a Favorite Team selected
custom_steps: When the user adds a team via the plus button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted with the following choices:

*Set as Favorite Team
*Add to Followed Teams

title: Adding Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the "My Teams" picker
and does not have any Favorite Team selected
custom_steps:
When the user adds a team via the plus button
and selects "Set as Favorite Team"
custom_expected:
Then the selected team will be listed under "Favorite Team"
and will have a red minus sign to the left of its logo

title: Adding Followed Team(s)
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the "My Teams" picker
and the user has selected a Favorite Team
custom_steps: When the user adds a team via the plus button
custom_expected:
Then the selected team will be listed under "Followed Teams"
and will have a red minus sign to the left of its logo

title: Adding Multiple Followed Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the "My Teams" picker
custom_steps: When the user adds multiple teams as "Followed Teams"
custom_expected:
Then all of "Followed Teams" will have red minus signs next to their name in the "Followed Teams" section
and all of "Followed Teams" will have an icon to their right to indicate that they can be re-ordered

title: Re-ordering Followed Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the "My Teams" picker
and the user has added multiple Followed Teams
custom_steps: When the user long presses the 3-line menu next to a Followed Team
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to re-order their choices

title: Removing Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the team picker
and the user has added a Favorite team
custom_steps: When the user tries to remove the favorite team by tapping on the minus button
custom_expected: Then the team will be removed from "Favorite Team"

title: Removing Followed Team(s)
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and the user lands on the team picker
and the user has added Followed team(s)
custom_steps: When the user tries to remove the followed team by tapping on the minus button
custom_expected: Then the team will be removed from "Followed Teams"

title: Tapping "Next"
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and is viewing the "My Teams" picker
custom_steps: When the user taps "Next"
custom_expected: Then the user will be advanced to the Notifications settings screen

title: Favorite/Followed Team(s) Added
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and has added Favorite and/or Followed team(s)
custom_steps: When the user advances to the Notifications settings screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will automatically be signed up for the following notifications:
MLB News
and notifications for their "Teams" selections: Game Start, Score Change, Game End, In-Game Video Highlights, News

and there will be a copy (either in English or Spanish) helping the user to better-understand why they would allow the app to send notifications

title: No Favorite/Followed Team(s)
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and has not added team(s) as Favorite and/or Followed
custom_steps: When the user advances to the Notifications settings screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will automatically be signed up for the following notifications:
MLB News

and there will be a copy (either in English or Spanish) helping the user to better-understand why they would allow the app to send notifications

title: Editing Notification Settings
custom_preconds: Given the user is going through onboarding
custom_steps:
When the user has landed on the notification settings screen
and edits their default notification settings 
(either add or remove channel subscriptions)
custom_expected: Then the user's settings should be saved

title: Tapping "Next"
custom_preconds: Given the user is going through onboarding
custom_steps: When the user has tapped "Next" from the Notification settings screen
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted with the Notification permissions alert

title: Notification Permissions
custom_preconds:
Given the user is going through onboarding
and has been prompted with the notification permissions prompt
custom_steps: When the user has either allowed or denied Notification permissions
custom_expected: Then the user will either be taken to the paywall if they are a Lite user, or to their app landing page if they are already logged in with a paid account

title: Confirming Notification Settings
custom_preconds: Given the user has edited their default notification settings during onboarding
custom_steps:
When the user views their notification settings in Account Settings
(accessible via More Menu)
custom_expected: Then the user's settings should reflect the changes that were made during onboarding

title: MLB Audio Subscriber
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is NOT entitled to the MLB.TV product, and is subscribed to MLB Audio
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see favorite team and notification settings screens as expected 
THEN the user should be able to advance into the app

title: MLB.TV Subscriber - Logged In User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in to the MLB app with a valid MLB.TV subscription (MLBALL)
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see their "My Teams" and Notification settings screens as expected
and the user should skip the paywall during the onboarding flow and be taken directly into the app, as a paid user

title: MLB.TV Subscriber - Anonymous IAP User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has purchased a valid MLB.TV subscription via in-app purchase (MLBALL)
and has not logged in/linked to the MLB app with an MLB account
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see their "My Teams" and Notification settings screens as expected
and the user should skip the paywall during the onboarding flow and be taken directly into the app, as a paid user

title: MLB Audio - Logged In User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in to the MLB app with a valid MLB Audio subscription (MLBAUDIO)
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see their "My Teams" and Notification settings screens as expected
and the user should skip the paywall during the onboarding flow and be taken directly into the app, as a paid user

title: MLB Audio - Anonymous IAP User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has purchased a valid MLB Audio subscription via in-app purchase (MLBAUDIO)
and has not logged in/linked to the MLB app with an MLB account
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see their "My Teams" and Notification settings screens as expected
and the user should skip the paywall during the onboarding flow and be taken directly into the app, as a paid user

title: Single Team/MLB Audio - Logged In User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in to the MLB app with a valid Single Team/MLB Audio subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see their "My Teams" and Notification settings screens as expected
and the user should skip the paywall during the onboarding flow and be taken directly into the app, as a paid user

title: Lite User - Anonymous
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user does not have any kind of subscription/entitlement
and is not logged into the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see "My Teams" and notification settings screens as expected 
and the user should be presented with the paywall before being able to advance into the app

title: Lite User - Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user does not have any kind of subscription/entitlement
and is logged into the MLB app with an MLB account
custom_steps: WHEN the user is going through upgrade onboarding during the first launch of a new major version
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see "My Teams" and notification settings screens as expected 
and the user should be presented with the paywall before being able to advance into the app
